Name: height
Desc: Gets or sets the height of the first node.
LongDesc: Controls the height dimension of elements. When called without parameters, returns the current height of the first element in the set including padding and border (offsetHeight). When provided with a value, sets the CSS height property for all elements in the set, accepting values in pixels, percentages, or other CSS units. This method provides a convenient way to manage element dimensions programmatically for responsive layouts, animations, or dynamic content areas.
